sections.title: Overview
sections.content: inPowerSuite offers a flexible, integration-ready platform, allowing businesses to extend functionality through add-ons and connect seamlessly with third-party systems.

panels.title: Fulfillment / 3PL Integration
listItems: Perform light pick/pack/ship operations
Shipment containerization
Light warehouse management by BIN locations
Integration to Third Party Logistics (3PL) vendors (EM3 Commerce, Zoyto, Estafeta, ParcelPort, Geodis, etc.)

panels.title: Commission Management
listItems: Configure uni-level, multi-level, stair-step breakaway plans
Flexible bonus architecture, product rebates
Coordinate weekly/monthly commission runs and retirement processing
Provides vital statistics, summaries, and charts of the commission results

panels.title: Content Management
listItems: Seamless website / web store branding
Full multi-language support for user-defined content
Includes labels, messages, email campaigns and business collateral

panels.title: Email Management
listItems: Manage email blasts and event driven auto-responders for order/shipping confirmations, welcome letters, upline notification, party invitations, jumpstart, and more

panels.title: Batch Processing Management
listItems: Manage back-ground processing with Oracle advanced queuing engine for end-of-day jobs

panels.title: Incentive Plan Management
listItems: Manage qualification rules and awards for jumpstart and trip incentive programs

panels.title: ERP Integration
listItems: Compatible with financial applications including Oracle E-Business, Sage, Intuit QuickBooks and others
Designed from the ground up to integrate with financial packages
Minimal impact on current ERP setup and quick time to market

panels.title: Third Party Integration
listItems: Provides address standardization (North America)
Interfaces to CCH Sales Tax / Local Tax Rates
Interfaces to PayPal's PayflowPro, Chase PaymenTech's Orbital, Global Collect's Webcollect, and various country specific gateways
